mdRecord.dcterms:title: Acetone test tablets
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ames Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Clear bottle with purple metal cap, filled with tablets. Label Information: Acetone Test Tablets, 100s; Acetest (brand) Reagent Tablets; Active ingredients: Sodium Nitroprusside, Aminoacetic Acid, Disodium Phosphate, Lactose; Ames Company, Inc., Elkhart, Indiana, U.S.A. Manufactured: 1960-07. Instructions on back of bottle and separate sheet included.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory technology
